html:
5.13.19  10:01 pm   will you eventually add more to the improv pages, when you have time

     yes

5.13.19  9:59 pm   Pls upload videosss

     i will but i have to make them first

5.13.19  9:57 pm   I'm new to composing and I'm finding it a bit awkward to place chords behind my melody. I have the first chord sounding right, but I just can't seem to find a nice sounding chord to follow. I'm trying to build a chord from the notes in the melody, but is this the wrong approach? Should I instead try to work from my first chord and find a chord progression from there as opposed to taking notes from my melody?

     sing the song, in real life. in real time. then, once you get to know it, then try to find the most important moment to put a chord. and just figure out what that 1 chord is for that one moment. if you try to just put chords one after another, people are gonna think you are some kind of chord machine, and you will never pass a captcha

5.13.19  9:32 pm   i fell into a rabbit hole of reading way too much about human biology. this came just after i watched a bunch of youtube videos of that "drowning simulator" video game from 2014. i got halfway through the wikipedia article about dura mater and all of a sudden i can't stop being hyper-aware of my own, and thinking about all my scraps of incredibly delicate human tissue and how dead all the individual components will be someday. yes my consciousness will be dead too but that's not important right now. all i can think about is peeling open a fetal pig's brain in high school science class but in my mind's eye it's happening to ME, how do i get this out of my head and should i keep studying human biology

     you could watch some horror movies

5.13.19  9:29 pm   I just ate a bagel 

     ah, #relatable

5.13.19  9:02 pm   When will your shirts be not sold out? I want more, the only one I could get was the non dog octet, which is amazing btw

     that's none of my business really

     you could build one

     more still

     not even close

5.13.19  6:59 pm   Is it true that if you put acid in your coffee instead of Red Bull you can see the 14th plane? 

     i think you'd see multiple planes

5.13.19  6:57 pm   What do you think the most magical piece of cutlery is? 

     the fridge

5.13.19  5:53 pm   how do transcribe chords by ear? melodies are easy but i don't even know how to begin approaching chords

     you could start with brute force, just sample it really quickly and listen for all the notes. but after you do about 50 songs you will suddenly know them automatically just because of your rapidly growing experience in songsmanship

5.13.19  4:55 pm   Is lyrics an instrument

     sure

5.13.19  4:04 pm   I am having a chemistry test tomorrow and I cant remember phenolphthalein and I know that it will be in the test. Any suggestions on how I should memorize it (except writing it down a million times)?

     make up a song about it

5.13.19  4:01 pm   I'm on the cusp of committing to an enormous personal project. I estimate it will take about a year to finish. It's the longest project I've ever considered to date.

I know you've had experience with something like this - you worked on hotewig for 11 months (if I remember correctly). So do you have any advice?

Mostly I'm just super scared that the results of this big project are not going to be what I want them to be.... or that I'll never even get the darn thing done. But I would not be able to live with myself if I never attempted anything like this

     all the advice i had you already have

5.13.19  3:59 pm   I'm planning to start learning on music and what instrument should I begin with I haven't played any instruments but I think I played piano once so what and how should u begin with Bill?

     i don't have any advice for planning to learn music

     confused because it used to

     work a lot on something that gives delayed payments

5.13.19  7:07 am   where on this sweet earth did I pick up this huge ass ego.  where did I get this idea that I'm so special and unique.  just throw me in the Huge Ass Ego Jail why don't you

5.13.19  6:22 am   what limits the limited companies?

     nothing, they are actually made stronger by placing limitations on what they can be liable for

5.13.19  3:14 am   Is it sensible to think of chefs and musicians as having the same level of proficiency, just in different departments?

     there are chefs and musicians with every level of proficiency. just choose your level of proficiancy and whether you want a chef or a musician and then press *print*

5.13.19  12:36 am   Is the trick you're learning related to 3D animation? If so, is it 3D animation of the same kind of things we've seen in videos before (stick figures, words, still backgrounds) or are you learning full-on high-frame-rate character animation?

     3D ANIMATION ALREADY TAKES 8,000,000 TIMES LONGER THAN 2D, WHY THE HELL WOULD I WANT TO INCREASE THE FRAME RATE ON TOP OF THAT

5.13.19  12:11 am   Would you ever consider your work "art"?

     it is purely science and business

5.12.19  11:16 pm   Is there anything you particularly like in the song Royal Scam by Steely Dan?

      yea, the chorus part with the backups ('see the glory of'). also the guitar riff in bar 3 of the vamps is nice for me. verses last way too long but i always assumed that was part of the scam

     yes, and bad

5.12.19  7:40 pm   Yo Bill, what is your opinion on the great silence?

     i give it 2 and a half stars

5.12.19  5:55 pm   how to undo feeling empty and sad

     you can't feel sad if you feel empty, but being sad undoes feeling empty, and feeling happy undoes being sad, and feeling empty undoes being happy. the cycle continues

5.12.19  5:49 pm   ETA for scramble("hottest new hot feeling");?

     5.16.19

5.12.19  5:10 pm   I'm writing a paper about "Mount St. Helens is About to Blow Up" for school, and I'm wondering, what is the relationship between music and video?

     as much as possible. they are meant to be played at exactly the same time, so the more intricate the relationship is, the better the viewer experience will be

5.12.19  4:03 pm   my mom is my brother. tips?

     call your doctor who also is the police

     yes

     1 week hopefully

     doesn't matter. get new ones

     opinions do not require entitlement
